text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Approach" means any roadway, overhead structure, ramp, bridge, causeway, entrance, and exit provided as a means of access to or departure from an Authority highway.

"Authority highway" means:
Each highway, tunnel, and bridge within the jurisdiction of the Maryland Transportation Authority; and
Each approach to these highways, tunnels, and bridges.
"Bridge" means any bridge within the jurisdiction of the Maryland Transportation Authority.

"Tunnel" means:
The Baltimore Harbor Tunnel; and
Any other tunnel within the jurisdiction of the Maryland Transportation Authority.
